name: tm58
effect: Teaches Endure to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Sky Drop to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Endure)

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user endures any attack, leaving 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
flavor_text.platinum: The user endures any attack, leaving 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user endures any attack, leaving 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
